texts: {"template":"intro","texts":["Over Christmas and New Year, most of the TfL network is open. However, today there are changes and planned works that may affect your journey."],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}
There are changes and planned works on the following services today. All our other services are running normally.
See our Status updates map for Monday 24 December for Tube, Overground, TfL Rail, DLR and tram services.
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"Tube"}
There is a reduced service:

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Weekday services are running. They are being reduced from about 15:00","Most last trains are at Sunday times","The Waterloo \u0026 City line is running a reduced service all day, with last trains at about 23:15"]}
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"London Overground"}
There are changes to services today:

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["On these routes, a weekday service will run, finishing from around 21:30:ul","On these routes, a weekday service will run until 12:00. Then a Saturday service will run, with services finishing from around 21:30ul","No service between South Tottenham and Barking and a reduced service between Gospel Oak and South Tottenham. Trains will run about every 30 minutes","No service between Romford and Upminster","No service between Edmonton Green and Cheshunt","Reduced service between Liverpool Street and Chingford (trains run about every 20 minutes, not stopping at Bethnal Green, Hackney Downs and Clapton)","Reduced service between Liverpool Street and Edmonton Green/Enfield Town (trains run about every 20 minutes, not stopping at Bethnal Green, Cambridge Heath, London Fields and Hackney Downs)","Please use replacement or local bus services - see our \u003ca href=\"http://tfl.gov.uk/tube-dlr-overground/status/?Input=\u0026lineIds=\u0026dateTypeSelect=Future date\u0026direction=\u0026startDate=2018-12-24T00%3a00%3a00\u0026endDate=2018-12-24T23%3a59%3a59#line-raillo-overground\"\u003estatus updates\u003c/a\u003e page"]}
Follow @LDNOverground for news and service information.
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"TfL Rail"}
There are no services running today.
Please use replacement or local buses. See our status updates page.
Follow @TfLRail for news and service information.
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"DLR"}
A Saturday service is running. Services will finish from around 22:00.
Follow @LondonDLR for news and service information.
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"Trams"}
We are running a reduced service:

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["There is a Saturday service until 18:00.","Trams run every 15 minutes on all routes between 18:00 and 20:00","Trams run every 20 minutes between 20:00 and Saturday last trams"]}
Follow @TramsLondon for news and service information
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"Buses"}
We are running a Saturday service today.

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["There are no night services","24-hour services finish around midnight; day buses are operating until normal last bus times","There is an enhanced Saturday service on route 507","On routes 521 and X68, there is a limited service"]}
See all today's planned bus changes on our Bus status updates map for Monday 24 December .
Follow @TfLBusAlerts for news and service information.
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"Driving"}

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["The Congestion Charge and T-Charge apply today","See our \u003ca href=\"https://tfl.gov.uk/traffic/status/?Input=\u0026lineIds=\u0026dateTypeSelect=Future date\u0026direction=\u0026startDate=2018-12-24T00%3a00%3a00\u0026endDate=2018-12-24T23%3a59%3a59\"\u003etraffic status updates map for Monday 24 December\u003c/a\u003e "]}
Follow @TfLTrafficNews on Twitter.
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"Emirates Air Line"}
Today the cable car is running 07:00-19:00.
Find out more in our Emirates Air Line section, see Status updates for Emirates Air Line on 24 December or follow @EmiratesAirLine on Twitter .
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"Taxis \u0026 minicabs"}

For taxis (black cabs) there is an extra charge of £4 if you're travelling between 20:00 tonight and 06:00 on Thursday 27 December. For private hire (including minicabs), there may be an extra charge - please check when you book.
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"River"}
Thames Clipper services finish early, from 19:30 at some piers tonight.
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"National Rail"}
Check National Rail's Christmas page for information about all service changes and planned works over Christmas and New Year.

Improvements between Acton and Wood Lane
